short_answer:
Hi Maria,

I’m sorry to hear one of the extra virgin olive oil bottles in Order #OI-48372 arrived damaged and leaked. If the item is unopened and was damaged during shipping, it may be eligible for a return (and refund) as long as the request is submitted within 7 days of delivery.

Next steps:
1) Please reply to this email confirming the delivery date (yesterday) and which bottle/size was damaged.
2) You’ve already done the right thing by including photos—please keep the damaged bottle and all packaging until we review.

Once approved, we’ll provide return/refund instructions. If approved, refunds are issued to the original payment method and are typically processed within 5–10 business days.

Best regards,
Olivetto Imports Support
clarifying_questions: Can you confirm the exact delivery date shown by the carrier (the date it was marked delivered)?
Which specific bottle/size in the order was damaged (and how many bottles were affected)?
